name: Horizon Globex
tag_list: voip, mobile-voip, horizon, smartpacket, voip-pbx, voip-switch, optimise-voip, optimize-voip, bandwidth-efficient-voip
overview:
Our goal is to optimise communications over the internet. We do this in two ways: By using bandwidth more efficiently and by giving users more control over how much data they consume.

We create innovative software solutions and integration systems for network operators and service providers in the fixed, mobile and satellite communications markets.

Horizon Globex (www.horizonglobex.com) is part of the One Horizon Group (www.onehorizongroup.com) and is based in Baar, Switzerland. The Group also includes SatCom Global (www.satcomglobal.com).

Horizon is the worldâ€™s most bandwidth-efficient VoIP platform. It has been specifically designed for environments where there is limited bandwidth available.

The core of the solution is our SmartPacketâ„¢ technology, which enables VoIP from only 2kbps. This extends into a range of optimised data applications â€“ compressed email, optimised web browsing and instant messaging services â€“ which are also designed to minimise the volume of data consumed and costs for the user.

Horizon operates on a secure, reliable network that is capable of interconnecting any phone system over IP (Internet Protocol). It is a complete end-to-end solution for network operators and service providers.

Horizon can be deployed in a flexible, scalable way, enabling your businesses customers to smoothly transition to IP while leveraging their existing network investments.

From a simple Desktop App to a complete Global Exchange platform, Horizon Globex offers all the necessary components to set up and manage your customersâ€™ VoIP requirements.
